item.title: How can install DarkCoin Wallet in Whonix Workstation?
item.dc:creator: QWEr
item.description:
cd ~
wget https://dashpay.io/electrum-DASH/releases/v2.4.1/Electrum-DASH-2.4.1-Linux_x86_64.tgz
tar -xpzvf Electrum-DASH-2.4.1-Linux_x86_64.tgz
cd Electrum-DASH-2.4.1
./electrum-DASH_x86_64.bin

root@host:/home/user# cd ~
root@host:~# wget https://dashpay.io/electrum-DASH/releases/v2.4.1/Electrum-DASH-2.4.1-Linux_x86_64.tgz
–2016-03-27 13:24:57-- https://dashpay.io/electrum-DASH/releases/v2.4.1/Electrum-DASH-2.4.1-Linux_x86_64.tgz
Resolving dashpay.io (dashpay.io)… 128.127.106.235
Connecting to dashpay.io (dashpay.io)|128.127.106.235|:443… connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response… 301 Moved Permanently
Location: https://www.dash.org/electrum-DASH/releases/v2.4.1/Electrum-DASH-2.4.1-Linux_x86_64.tgz [following]
–2016-03-27 13:24:58-- https://www.dash.org/electrum-DASH/releases/v2.4.1/Electrum-DASH-2.4.1-Linux_x86_64.tgz
Resolving www.dash.org (www.dash.org)… 128.127.106.235
Connecting to www.dash.org (www.dash.org)|128.127.106.235|:443… connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response… 404 Not Found
2016-03-27 13:25:00 ERROR 404: Not Found.

root@host:~# tar -xpzvf Electrum-DASH-2.4.1-Linux_x86_64.tgz
tar (child): Electrum-DASH-2.4.1-Linux_x86_64.tgz: Cannot open: No such file or directory
tar (child): Error is not recoverable: exiting now
tar: Child returned status 2
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now
root@host:~# cd Electrum-DASH-2.4.1
bash: cd: Electrum-DASH-2.4.1: No such file or directory
root@host:~# ./electrum-DASH_x86_64.bin
bash: ./electrum-DASH_x86_64.bin: No such file or directory

item.title: How can install DarkCoin Wallet in Whonix Workstation?
item.dc:creator: QWEr
item.source: How can install DarkCoin Wallet in Whonix Workstation?

item.title: How can install DarkCoin Wallet in Whonix Workstation?
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
Non-Whonix-specific part:
type “How to install Dash wallet” into search engine

Whonix-specific part:
(v0.12)
Settings Menu -> Options -> Network:

  • Disable UPnP
  • Uncheck ‘Allow incoming’
  • Check 'Connect through SOCKS5’
    Proxy IP = your Whonix Gateway’s IP Address
    Port = pick unused: 9111 or 9153-9159

From https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Money#See_Also:
Is this attack applicable to Dash? Bitcoin over Tor isn’t a good idea

Read full topic
